author: Travis Gettys
title: Trump-endorsed 'freaks and liars' are making Republicans worried about midterm chances: Morning Joe

sentence: Well see how competitive primaries, or lack thereof, impact other top Senate races this cycle, including the handful of Republicans running against each other in Arizona, whether Republican Herschel Walker was sufficiently vetted before the primary in Georgia, and whether North Carolina Democrat Cheri Beasley could have used a competitive primary to boost her operation.
author: Nathan L. Gonzales
title: The case for primaries: Pennsylvania edition

sentence: Republican target: Georgia Primary date: May 24 Forecast: Toss-up Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock and Republican Herschel Walker are on a November collision course in the most closely divided state of the 2020 presidential election.
title: These 7 states will decide control of the Senate
